title: Beef, kidney and mushroom pie with a homemade puff pastry lid
description: A traditional pie made extra special by the addition of homemade puff pastry. Making your own puff pastry is tricky, but stick with it and you will be rewarded with buttery flaky gorgeousness.
ingredients: 550g/1lb 4oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
550g/1lb 4oz unsalted butter, soft enough to be pliable
500g/1lb 2oz beef stewing steak, cut into 5cm/2in cubes
2kg/4lb 8oz potatoes, larger potatoes cut into quarters
salt and freshly ground black pepper
